meanings.definition: To exceed in weight or importance
meanings.sent1: The elephant outweighs the mouse in size.
meanings.sent2: In this competition, strength outweighs speed.
meanings.sent3: The pile of homework outweighs the fun of playing outside.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness outweighs any material possessions.
meanings.sent5: The impact of his words outweighs the silence that followed.

meanings.definition: To be more significant or valuable than
meanings.sent1: The safety of the children outweighs everything else.
meanings.sent2: In this decision, honesty outweighs any other factor.
meanings.sent3: The joy of winning outweighs the disappointment of losing.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to the cause outweighs any doubts others may have.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset outweighs the worries of the day.
